attributes.action: Don’t scrap/merge the UK’s Department for International Development (DIFID).
attributes.additional_details:
DIFID is world renowned for delivering value for money and impact, and is by far the most transparent department in government. 
It’s a national asset we should all be proud of rather than merging or scrapping it. 

Over its 22 years so far, the UK’s world-leading Department for International Development has saved millions of lives. It’s led the world in tackling Covid-19, Ebola, extreme poverty and gender inequality, and provided life-saving aid following devastating disasters  and conflicts. Please leave it as an independent force for good.
attributes.background: Plans to merge the UK’s Department for International Development with the Foreign & Commonwealth Office will sabotage the UK’s ability to respond effectively and equitably to global crises to help those who need our aid the most.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327602
